REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0204 reute h f BC-MFS-MUNICIPAL-INCOME 03-02 0050

TEXT.TITLE: MFS MUNICIPAL INCOME TRUST <MFM> SETS PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: MFS Municipal Income Trust said it declared a monthly income distribution of 5.7 cts a share compared with 5.5 cts a share paid in the previous month. It said the distribution is payable March 27 to shareholders of record March 13. Reuter
